channel.title: Mastermind's Spy
channel.description:
Even though Apostle has a Cult Spy, Blue Dragon still uses the omega-meta tactic of mass-claiming to King and Prince, that games don't feel fresh nor clean anymore. While I know that this is highly efficient, it ruins the feel of the game. And there is basicallt no drawback, as the amount of times Apostle is a Starting Cult is only 1/12 of the time. So I suggest something be done to deter mass claiming while giving the Unseen some form of compensation for failed conversions, but also on adding strategy to the usually reckless Night 1 plays. Noble's Spy should also be nerfed to give scum an edge in whisper knowledge.
[quote] (For Mastermind) Covert Spy: (D) (0) Select 1 player. You will see all whispers to and from them for the rest of the day. Gain 1 use each night you fail to convert or don't convert when it is not on cooldown. [/quote] [quote] (For Noble) Maid Spy: (N) (4) Select 2 players. You will see all whispers to and from them for the rest of the day. Cannot target the King and will not count as visits. [/quote]
Please leave feedback on if this would be a healthy solution on the game.

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: Reaper
item.description:
hey were you lurking my idea on discord!!
Well, I like the idea of MM having a whisper reading ability. I plan to make a deep analysis thread about all the whisper mechanic, metagame and abilities soon and was gonna put that idea in there.
Also putting it together with not converting is pretty good, a reward for the saddest thing in this game rn at least

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It is a guaranteed class in Unseen. Given the average number of failed converts in a game that is as good as having an aristocrat. However since you don’t actually need an aristocrat to use the ability it makes the class redundant.

Thus this kind of ability needs to be as weak as it can be while still fulfilling it’s purpose. Making it 1 target player (including king) is a great way to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I mean why do you think so? Others have given their reasoning

and @NuclearBurrito how about 2-target that can still select King

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Despite all the negative feedback, I really love the idea. I feel that this solution fixes multiple problems. A) being that Unseen can sometimes fail multiple converts costing them to lose the game, B) the “meta’s” such as prince meta and king meta. And the amount of uses is really balanced. Since it only works if Unseen fails convert

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
There’s nothing wrong with mass claiming to king. Games are boring if people don’t out or claim. The only change I would support would be reverting the maid spy changes(aristo and apostle should keep the new one though) and giving possessor a passive which lets them hear all whispers. That should be plenty.

snipufin:

Maid Spy was a mistake.

The new maid spy is a mistake. The old one was fine.

Firelitten1:

Now that we think about it would it truly be bad to give possessor power to see all whispers?

I would be fine with that, but only if noble’s maid spy was changed back to the old one(aristocrat and apostle should keep it though).

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind's Spy
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Reposting my Possessor buff suggestion. Won’t stop reposting it until the Possessor gets significant buffs.

The Possessor

Neutral Killer
Driven (Passive) - Immune to occupation at night and immune to target changing. Also allows the user to see the contents of all whispers during the day.
Blackened Shield (Passive) - Immune to death at night.
Marionette (Day) - Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further. - 3 uses
Ethereal Leap (Day) - Choose a target, and if the user is executed at daytime they will use posses on their target, bypassing healing, prevention, and night immunity, while also consuming a charge of Possess if they still have one. If the user survives the day then they will not be able to use any of their abilities during the night and will instead leap into their chosen target. Ethereal Leap is usable during the night if the user is jailed, taking effect regardless if the Possessor is executed by the Prince or not. - 1 use
Puppet Strings (Night) - Control a player and force them to kill another. You will also see whispers to and from the controlled player the next day. They will not be aware that they were controlled. Note that they still act normally that night; this does not replace their action. - Infinite uses
Possess (Night) - You will take over a person’s body, leaving your old one behind. Your target can not be healed. The old body will keep the class and logbook you had before. Your first victim will appear as a class of your choice to everyone. The second will appear as the first victim’s class. Additionally, when you possess a player, you will receive their deathnote. Additionally, you will gain your target’s passive while in their body. - 3 uses
Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon, Unseen, Cult and any neutrals that dare stand in your way.

Read full topic
